L001.name: Town Square
L001.desc_en: The central square of the town, bustling with daily activity.

L002.name: Market Stalls
L002.desc_en: A cluster of market stalls filled with merchants and customers.

L003.name: Temple of the Tide
L003.desc_en: A serene temple dedicated to the tides and the sea.

L004.name: Town Hall
L004.desc_en: The administrative heart of the town.

L005.name: Harbor Gate
L005.desc_en: The guarded gate controlling access to the harbor.

L006.name: Docks
L006.desc_en: Busy docks where ships arrive and depart.

L007.name: Warehouse Row
L007.desc_en: A row of warehouses storing goods and secrets.

L008.name: Smuggler's Entrance
L008.desc_en: A concealed entrance used by smugglers.

L009.name: Old Well
L009.desc_en: An old well surrounded by rumors and whispers.

L011.name: East Alley
L011.desc_en: A narrow alley known for shady dealings.

L012.name: Back Door - Copper Cup
L012.desc_en: A discreet back entrance to the Copper Cup tavern.

L014.name: South Bridge
L014.desc_en: A stone bridge spanning the southern river.

L015.name: Riverside Path
L015.desc_en: A quiet path following the riverbank.

L016.name: Fishermen's Shacks
L016.desc_en: Simple shacks where fishermen live and work.

L017.name: Lumberyard
L017.desc_en: A yard stacked with timber and tools.

L018.name: Wizard's House
L018.desc_en: The residence of the town wizard, filled with arcane signs.

L019.name: Copper Cup
L019.desc_en: A lively tavern popular with locals.

L020.name: Bar Counter
L020.desc_en: The main bar counter inside the tavern.

L022.name: Storeroom Door
L022.desc_en: A closed storeroom door hiding unknown contents.
